content: hook and needles w ww vendulkam blogspot com picture of straight edge the color changes for the cardigan size 3 years size 5 years row 1-4 apple green row 1-4 28-30 light pink row 5-8 hot pink row 5-8 31-33 hot pink row 9-12 light pink row 9-12 34-36 orange row 13-16 white row 13-16 37-39 violet row 17-20 brown-grey row 17-20 40-42 light green row 21-24 light blue row 21-24 43-45 apple green row 25 until end white row 25 - 27 46-48 turquoise instruction size 5 years old child starting at the neckline chain 108 row 1 double_crochet into the 4th chain from the hook the first 3 chain count as the 1st double_crochet here and throughout then double_crochet into every stitch across 106 double_crochet turn work © vendula maderska 2013 the patterns are intended for personal use only needles w ww vendulkam blogspot com row 2 1 chain single_crochet into each double_crochet across 106 single_crochet for the following rounds work from the chart below how to read the chart example row 3 you will make 3 chain as 1 first double_crochet 1 double_crochet in every 16 stitches from previous row 3 double_crochet in next stitch 1 double_crochet in next 19 stitches from previous row 3 double_crochet in next stitch 1 double_crochet in next 32 stitches from previous row 3 double_crochet in next stitch 1 double_crochet in next 19 stitches from previous row 3 double_crochet in next stitch 1 double_crochet in next 16 stitches from previous row you will have 114 double_crochet at the end of this row size 5 years old child number number number number total of of of of front front
